name: Heirloom (SavaDimitrov)
description:
Heirloom is a horror-adventure game where you'll have to use your wits to survive. Explore the world carefully, don't let any detail slip, it might just be the difference between life or death.

Follow the journey of Aadila, a young girl whose life had a turn for the worse, suffering under an unfair regime. Left alone to fend for herself, she has to overcome hardships no child should ever face. It is hard to survive when everybody drags you down, clawing away at your innocence. Escape this nightmare. Follow the Light.
